biotools.summary: Phydelity, a redesign of PhyCLIP, is a statistically-principled and phylogeny-informed tool capable of identifying putative transmission clusters in pathogen phylogenies without the introduction of arbitrary distance thresholds

bioschemas.name: Phydelity
bioschemas.summary: Phydelity, a redesign of PhyCLIP, is a statistically-principled and phylogeny-informed tool capable of identifying putative transmission clusters in pathogen phylogenies without the introduction of arbitrary distance thresholds
